features.name: Report Catalog Browser
features.description: Displays available reports organized by categories with metadata like last viewed date and execution time. Users can expand reports to view their schema definition.

features.name: Report Schema Display
features.description: Shows detailed schema information for each report including field types, formats, required status, and calculations.

features.name: Report Display and Data Table
features.description: Main report view with paginated, sortable table displaying report data with configurable page sizes and navigation controls.

features.name: Column Customization
features.description: Allows users to select multiple Supabase tables and choose specific columns to display in their custom reports. Supports multi-table joins and column prefixing.

features.name: Advanced Filtering System
features.description: Comprehensive filtering interface with multiple conditions (equals, not equals, greater than, less than, contains, starts with, ends with) and support for AND/OR logical operations.

features.name: Data Export Functionality
features.description: Exports report data to multiple formats including CSV, Excel (XLSX), and PDF with formatted tables and headers.

features.name: Sorting and Pagination
features.description: Client-side and server-side sorting by any column with ascending/descending order. Pagination with customizable page sizes (10, 20, 50, 100 rows).

features.name: Supabase Data Integration
features.description: Fetches data from Supabase database tables with support for single and multi-table queries, filtering, sorting, and pagination.

features.name: Mock Data Service
features.description: Provides fallback mock employee timesheet data for testing and development when Supabase tables are not configured.

features.name: Report Preferences Storage
features.description: Saves and retrieves user preferences for report columns, filters, and last viewed timestamps using localStorage with Supabase backup.

features.name: Searchable Select Component
features.description: Reusable dropdown component with search/filter functionality for selecting from large lists of options.

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: User feedback system for displaying success, error, and informational messages.

features.name: Date Formatting Utilities
features.description: Helper functions for formatting dates in MM/DD/YYYY format and other date-related operations.

features.name: Application Routing
features.description: React Router setup with routes for report selector, individual reports, customization, and filtering pages.

features.name: Keyboard Shortcuts
features.description: Supports keyboard shortcuts like Ctrl+F for filters and Ctrl+E for export in the report view.
